elements.text: As you're leaving the movie theater with a friend, you realize you don't remember where the car is parked. Your friend takes a deep sigh, and you wonder what they are thinking. Later that night, your friend remarks that lately you have been more...

elements.name: Parked Car_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
